downloadTitle: Book Download: Building Elastic and Resilient Cloud Applications - Developer's Guide to the Enterprise Library 5.0 Integration Pack for Windows Azure
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Enterprise Library Integration Pack for Windows Azure is an extension to the Microsoft Enterprise Library 5.0 that can be used with Windows Azure. It includes the Autoscaling Application Block, the Transient Fault Handling Application Block, a protected configuration provider and the Blob configuration source.

detailsSection:
Authors: Dominic Betts, Jérémi Bourgault, Julian Dominguez, Ercenk Keresteci, Grigori Melnik, Fernando Simonazzi and Erwin van der Valk.

This guide covers many new features for Windows Azure application developers and IT professionals:

  • Two new application blocks:
    • Autoscaling Application Block ("Wasabi")
    • Transient Fault Handling Application Block ("Topaz")
  • Blob configuration source
  • Windows PowerShell cmdlets for Wasabi
  • Protected configuration provider
  • Updated database creation scripts
  • On-premises sample application for hosting the Autoscaling Application Block and exploratory testing (packaged with the Integration Pack Source and located under (install location)/WindowsAzure/Autoscaling/Hosts/ConsoleAutoscaler)
  • Experience guidance:
    • Reference documentation
    • Developer’s guide
    • Tailspin Surveys sample application
